page.title: 10GOVERNMENT; LAW AND ORDER.
page.content: {OWSTON AREA LOCAL GOVERNMENT} {____________________________ Local affairs in Owston area are administered by the Owston and Newbold Parish Meeting which has an elected chairman and committee of nine, which includes one Newbold representative. The area is represented on the District and County Councils and comes under the Harborough M.P. and the Northanpton Euro M.P. The Council operates at Market Harborough and is responsible for refuse disposal, cleaning drains, cutting verges and maintenance of roads. There are no street lights. Knossington has a Parish Council and relates to Melton Mowbray for its M.P. and Council matters. The local Magistrates' Court is at Melton. Police cover is from Melton with additional service from Oakham and Syston.
